recipesJson.name: Ckemist Original: Mango Bear
recipesJson.author: EJuiceMakers
recipesJson.description:
The Hype Juice you crave. Adjust Sweetener to tastes. 
Subs: PM can be subbed for FLV Mango or INW Mango .5%

reviews.text: I was so excited that I grabbed 27 Bears and mixed up first. Once I noticed that and tasted I went back to mix the 27 Fish instantly. Tasty as fudge! With both 27 Fish & 27 Bears.
